opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of July, 2015, the Application for Extraordinary Relief Pursuant to the Court's King’s Bench Power and/or Plenary Jurisdiction is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
